::Savanna::

In her lioness mode stood next to Kluster.  She saw Artist nudging 
HotRod.  She smiled. It kind of reminded her of the cubs back home on 
the African plains. She looked at HotRod.  "He's yours?" refering to 
Artist.

> Artist howled and ran up to Hot Rod, he stood up to Hot Rod's 
waist. He
